channel.title: Grargh i cant make my own server..... help please
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img250.imageshack.us/img250/2236/runescapehelp8ma.png[/img] ok well whenever i clik create server it says...
Server: Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?
please help me........
btw i have the one that u install becuz im pretty sure that there is one u can just get a bunch of apps for and then u have the files to or soemthing... i dunno wtvr but please help![br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2007, 06:54:03 PM[/size][hr]ok well i realised im suppose to port forward but i cant figure out how to do it on my router because i ened to know my computers ip adress (such as 192.168.0.1) this is the main computer plugged into the first port of the router.... just to let u know.... but it wont let me put in like the number 2 or the number 1 like it says and then i went to port forwarding and that was no help because it says u need to pik a game and theres no game called moparscape -.- ya so help

item.title: Grargh i cant make my own server..... help please
item.dc:creator: @sk8erevan sk8erevan
item.description:
@sk8erevan wrote:

update… added a picture…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2007, 08:02:10 PM[/size][hr]yo i added a picture of my advanced settings tab… and theres no “games” thing to edit ??? wat the heck???[br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2007, 09:57:34 PM[/size][hr]come on someone help me!!

item.source: Grargh i cant make my own server..... help please

item.title: Grargh i cant make my own server..... help please
item.dc:creator: @adamhack adamhack
item.description:
@adamhack wrote:

in Windows Firewall and/or the firewalls offered by McAffee, Norton, or other full-system maintenance suites. For Windows Firewall, open its settings file in the control panel. Click on the “Exceptions Tab” and then click “Add Port.” Add the following port: 43594.

Read full topic
